mapper.select: SELECT b.date, (select concat((SELECT date_sub(b.date,interval 6 day)),'~',b.date)) AS stadate, SUM(b.rebatetotal) AS totalrebate, (CASE WHEN f.totalrebate IS NULL THEN 0 WHEN f.totalrebate='' THEN 0 ELSE f.totalrebate END) AS settlerebate FROM taxes_invite_week b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.date,SUM(e.rebatetotal) AS totalrebate FROM taxes_invite_week e WHERE e.date <(SELECT d.date FROM taxes_directly_week d GROUP BY d.date DESC LIMIT 1) AND isaward=2 GROUP BY e.date ORDER BY e.date DESC ) f ON b.date=f.date WHERE b.date <(SELECT c.date FROM taxes_directly_week c GROUP BY c.date DESC LIMIT 1) GROUP BY b.date ORDER BY b.date DESC
